Cardiovascular Diseases/Vascular Diseases/Vasculitis/Systemic Vasculitis/Anti-Neutrophil Cytoplasmic Antibody-Associated Vasculitis/Wegener Granulomatosis
Record.Description: A multisystemic disease of a complex genetic background. It is characterized by inflammation of the blood vessels (VASCULITIS) leading to damage in any number of organs. The common features include granulomatous inflammation of the RESPIRATORY TRACT and kidneys. Most patients have measurable autoantibodies (ANTINEUTROPHIL CYTOPLASMIC ANTIBODIES) against neutrophil proteinase-3 (WEGENER AUTOANTIGEN).
